1.0.name: wordpress/instant-suggest
1.0.description:
Features

  • Suggest keywords, check spell and autocomplete as you type.
  • Compatible with TinyMCE and CKEditor and following plugins: TinyMCE Advanced, Ultimate TinyMCE and CKEditor for Wordpress.
  • Custom suggestion services.
  • Auto show suggestions when you select text with keyboard, mouse or markers
  • Very easy to use
  • Write article much faster

Future features

  • Suggest images and videos

Live demo

http://www.instantsuggest.com/editor

User guide

http://www.instantsuggest.com/documentation/user-guide

FAQ & Discussion
